name: get_calendar_events
description: Get upcoming calendar events from Google Calendar. Can retrieve events for today, tomorrow, this week, or a specific date range.

start_date.description: Start date for custom range (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD). Only used if time_range is 'custom'.

end_date.description: End date for custom range (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD). Only used if time_range is 'custom'.

max_results.description: Maximum number of events to return (default: 10)
